entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
